title: (x) grotesque face w/ single storey 'a' - FF Schulbuch Nord {Stephen}
content:
This is embarrassing!  
Thanks Folks.

author: mik

comments.content:
AG Schoolbook medium.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=AG+Schoolbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015165758/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=AG+Schoolbook "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=AG+Schoolbook")  
Or.  
FF Schulbuch Nord Fett.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-schulbuch/nord-fett/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015165758/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-schulbuch/nord-fett/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-schulbuch/nord-fett/")  
Hard to tell by the image.

Good call, Jan. They are basically derived from the same source. [FF Schulbuch](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015165758/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_schulbuch_nord_fett/&sample_text=Argentina%20Cartef&sample_size=48) will get you there.
Oops. Linked to myfonts instead of fontshop.
Hehe, that’s totally fine. Just thought I’d do the custom sample to show the match.
